text: The Berber languages or Tamazight are a group of closely related languages mainly spoken in Morocco and Algeria. Kabyle and Tachelhit are Berber languages. == Other websites == *Berber Research Center (INALCO, Paris) * Interview with Rachid Aadnani on the Amazigh issue *Imyura, Berber website about literature, mostly Kabyle === Websites that are in Berber language === * Moroccan Press Agency, the Berber version * Royal Institute of Amazigh Culture
title: Berber languages
